title: 3/5/18 - Mark Levin Audio Rewind
description:
On Monday’s Mark Levin show, there is no such thing as free trade but the goal is to have freer trade. There are always taxes and regulations on trade, but a tariff on steel, aluminum, and lumber won’t punish the Chinese, only the American citizens. Ch...
